title: 正版启动器无法刷新版本列表
author: Lucky_fish0w0
txt_content:
如题，无论挂不挂VPN都无卵用。。。。以下为报错
[12:41:25 ERROR]: Unexpected exception refreshing version list java.net.SocketException: Connection reset         at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:189) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:121) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.readFully(InputRecord.java:465) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.read(InputRecord.java:503) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readRecord(SSLSocketImpl.java:954) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.waitForClose(SSLSocketImpl.java:1737) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.HandshakeOutStream.flush(HandshakeOutStream.java:124) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.Handshaker.kickstart(Handshaker.java:977) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.kickstartHandshake(SSLSocketImpl.java:1455) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.performInitialHandshake(SSLSocketImpl.java:1319) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(SSLSocketImpl.java:1371) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.startHandshake(SSLSocketImpl.java:1355) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.net.[url]www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.afterConnect[/url](HttpsClient.java:563) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.net.[url]www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect[/url](AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.java:185) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.net.[url]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream0[/url](HttpURLConnection.java:1511) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at sun.net.[url]www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream[/url](HttpURLConnection.java:1439) ~[?:1.8.0_25]         at ~[launcher.jar:1.6.61]         at net.minecraft.launcher.updater.RemoteVersionList.getContent(RemoteVersionList.java:60) ~[launcher.jar:1.6.61]         at net.minecraft.launcher.updater.RemoteVersionList.refreshVersions(RemoteVersionList.java:42) ~[launcher.jar:1.6.61]         at net.minecraft.launcher.updater.MinecraftVersionManager.refreshVersions(MinecraftVersionManager.java:62) ~[launcher.jar:1.6.61]         at net.minecraft.launcher.Launcher$2.run(Launcher.java:133) [launcher.jar:1.6.61]         at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511) [?:1.8.0_25]         at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266) [?:1.8.0_25]         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142) [?:1.8.0_25]         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617) [?:1.8.0_25]         at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [?:1.8.0_25]复制代码

错误主要是connection reset，感觉长城防火墙用了IP黑名单，同时VPN穿透性不强...
原先在windows10的启动器以前是能成功刷新，现在转战win8倒不行了...


还有VPN用的是psiphon，人称赛风

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
Connection reset 是某墙中断连接的常见手段
也就是说，fq失败了
